DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective, randomized study comparing VATS( Video-Assisted Thoracoscopy ) to reinsertion of a Thoracostomy Tube in patients with retained haemothorax. The hypothesis is that early VATS as opposed to reinsertion of a thoracostomy tube , will lead to less complications and shorter hospital stay.
DOC.brief_title: VATS ( Video-Assisted Thoracoscopy) Compared to Reinsertion of a Thoracostomy Tube for Persistent Haemothorax
DOC.criteria: Clinical and radiological diagnosis of retained haemothorax Thoracostomy tube blockage or failure to drain more than one attempt at thoracostomy tube drainage unable to consent to trial coexisting pathology requiring other interventions
